title: how long until beta client becomes a requirement
body: I run league on a wine emulator, and it doesnt really like the new client, it is laggy buggy and sometimes just flat doesnt work. i dont expect riot to cater to linux users, i just want to know how much longer i can play league until someone fixes the new client on wine

replies.body:
I don't have a specific date on when the Beta Client will fully release and the *Legacy Client* retires, unfortunately. You can keep up with the discussions around the new client on our [**Client Discussions Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) or on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

Let me know if you need help with anything else.

Please, please, please do not make the updated client mandatory until all the features of the old are ported. I know everything takes time. I know you prioritized based on demand and usage. But it doesn't seem right that replays and practice tools were added before item sets were brought over.

The item sets issue is magnified by the fact that there was a bug where existing item effects didn't load unless you loaded them in game in the old client first.

And if none of this can be avoided now, what third party item set software does Riot currently recommend?
